captures-table.title: Captures
captures-table.alert-deleting-text: Are you sure you want to delete the selected files?

capture-form-import.error-capture-name-exist: File with name {{ name }} already exists
capture-form-import.alert-success-import: Files uploaded successfully. Now you can set metadata.
capture-form-import.alert-importing-limit: You reach the maximum amount of imported files per time
capture-form-import.alert-importing-error-form: Some files have not been uploaded successfully. You can try to fix and import them again or move forward to the metadata form.

label-table.title: Segments
label-table.alert-deleting-text: Are you sure you want to delete segments?
label-table.label-form-error-stat-greater-end: Segment start location cannot be greater than segment end location
label-table.label-form-error-stat-less-0: Segment start location cannot be less than 0
label-table.label-form-error-end-greater-max: Segment end location cannot be greater than the file length
label-table.label-form-error-duplicates: Cannot have duplicate segment labels in the same location

label-values-table.title: Labels
label-values-table.alert-deleting-text: Are you sure you want to delete the {{labelName}} label? Deleting a label will permanently delete all segments in your projects that use the label.

metadata.title: Metadata
metadata.dialog-delete-alert-description: Are you sure you want to delete the metadata {{name}}? Deleting a metadata property will permanently remove the metadata from all files in your project.

dialog-form-label.validation-error-empty: Label name should be not empty

dialog-form-metadata.validation-error-duplicate: Metadata with name {{ name }} already exists
dialog-form-metadata.type-dropdown-help: Define a custom list of values to select from a dropdown
dialog-form-metadata.type-text-help: Enter your metadata value through a text input box

dialog-form-metadata-values.dialog-delete-alert-description: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}? Deleting a metadata value will permanently remove the metadata from all files in your project.
dialog-form-metadata-values.dialog-alert-unsaved-description: There are unsaved metadata values. Are you sure you want to close the form?

dialog-form-project.validation-error-duplicate: Project with name {{ name }} already exists

table-api-keys.description: API Keys allow authenticating a python SDK accessing the cloud resources
table-api-keys.dialog-delete-alert-description: Are you sure you want to delete the following API Key: {{name}}?
table-api-keys.dialog-delete-success-message: API Key {{name}} has been deleted successfully

dialog-form-api-key.validation-error-duplicate: API Key name {{ name }} already exists
dialog-form-api-key.description-create: Provide name to associate it with generated API Key
dialog-form-api-key.description-is-created: Here is your API key for {{ name }} app. You will not be able to view this password again once you close this window, so be sure to record it.
